quadrilaterals.parallelograms.rectangles.square.Square¶

class quadrilaterals.parallelograms.rectangles.square.Square(side_length)¶

Base class common to all squares.

>>> import quadrilaterals
>>> q = quadrilaterals.Square(0.2)
__init__(side_length)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Initialize self.

area()

Return the area of the square.

axes_of_symmetry()

Return the number of axes of symmetry of the quadrilateral.

Return the perimeter of the quadrilateral.
